GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APPLICANT_DETAILS.title: Applicant Name(s) & Address(es)
APPLICANT_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter the full name(s) and address(es) of the locker hirer(s) requesting this cancellation.
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR, 12 M.G. ROAD, MUMBAI'

NOMINEE_TO_CANCEL.title: Nominee Name & Address (To be Cancelled)
NOMINEE_TO_CANCEL.instruction:
Enter the name and address of the nominee you wish to remove.
Example: 'SUNITA SHARMA, 45 PARK STREET, DELHI'

LOCKER_TYPE.title: Type of Locker
LOCKER_TYPE.instruction:
Specify the size or type of the locker.
Example: 'SMALL', 'MEDIUM', or 'A-TYPE'

LOCKER_NO.title: Locker Number
LOCKER_NO.instruction:
Enter the specific locker number.
Example: 'L-105' or 'A-22'

LOCKER_ADDITIONAL_DETAILS.title: Additional Details (If any)
LOCKER_ADDITIONAL_DETAILS.instruction:
Any extra details to identify the locker (optional).
Example: 'KEY NO. 405'

NOMINEE_TABLE_DETAILS.title: Nominee Details (Table)
NOMINEE_TABLE_DETAILS.instruction:
Re-enter the details of the nominee being removed as per the table columns: Name, Address, Contact No, Relationship, and DOB.
Example: 'SUNITA SHARMA, SPOUSE, 15-08-1980'

NOMINEE_CUST_ID.title: Nominee Customer ID
NOMINEE_CUST_ID.instruction:
If the nominee has an IDFC Bank Customer ID, enter it here.
Example: '10002345'

PLACE.title: Place
PLACE.instruction:
Enter the city where you are signing this form.
Example: 'MUMBAI'

DATE.title: Date
DATE.instruction:
Enter the date of submission in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '25-12-2023'

SIGNATURE_1.title: Signature of 1st Holder
SIGNATURE_1.instruction: The primary hirer must sign here.

SIGNATURE_2.title: Signature of 2nd Holder
SIGNATURE_2.instruction: If the locker is held jointly, the 2nd holder must sign here.

SIGNATURE_3.title: Signature of 3rd Holder
SIGNATURE_3.instruction: If the locker is held by three people, the 3rd holder must sign here.

WITNESS_1.title: Witness 1 Name & Address
WITNESS_1.instruction:
REQUIRED if using Thumb Impression. Enter Witness 1's Name, Address, and Signature.
Example: 'AMIT SINGH, ANDHERI WEST'
rejections: Thumb impression used but Witness 1 missing

WITNESS_2.title: Witness 2 Name & Address
WITNESS_2.instruction: REQUIRED if using Thumb Impression. Enter Witness 2's Name, Address, and Signature.
rejections: Thumb impression used but Witness 2 missing

BANK_USE_BRANCH.title: Branch Name (Bank Use)
BANK_USE_BRANCH.instruction:
Bank Official Use Only: Enter Branch Name.
Example: 'NARIMAN POINT BRANCH'

BANK_USE_CABINET_ID.title: Cabinet ID (Bank Use)
BANK_USE_CABINET_ID.instruction:
Bank Official Use Only: Enter Cabinet ID.
Example: 'CAB-001'
